name: Psych•Ape
description:
You are a detective right out of police school, with a unique kink. You can read minds. Dash headfirst into a tale of darkness, misery and deceptive facts that will fantasticate you.

CONTROLS-
Arrow keys - Move
Space - Dash
Enter - UI manipulation and interaction
Escape - Pause

CREDITS-
Story, Dialogue, Screenplay, Sprites, Screens - Son Tom (sontomnetwork.itch.io)
Game, Maps, Music, Sprites - helewrer3 (helewrer3.itch.io)
Music - Selectivity29

TIPS- Pause the game once when in someone's brain.
